column4: hi I'm a gentoo user, and I need some translation from ubuntu to gentoo : this article explains the fix on ubuntu (http://froebe.net/blog/2010/01/22/suns-virtualbox-3-1-x-getting-vrdp-remote-desktop-to-authenticate-properly-with-linux-pam/) but the problem is, I don't have a shadow group on my gentoo system, so I would like to know what this shadow group is
did you ask in the #gentoo channel ....yes?
yes I did, but they are confused to what the problem is...
